SummaryEnglish: Based on the popular mobile game of the same name. Bungo and Alchemist -Gears of Judgement- is set in a fantasy world with famous and handsome historical figures from the field of literature, who must call upon their magical abilities to save books that have been tainted by evil forces.
Aliases: Bungou to Alchemist: Shinpan no Haguruma
Literary Greats and Alchemists: The Gears of Judgment
Bungo to Alchemist - Shinpan no Haguruma
Bungo to Alchemist: Shinpan no Haguruma
Bungo and Alchemist - Gears of Judgement

1.SummaryEnglish: A young greek man named Melos must run to save his friend from a tyrant king. But then he finds out he's more than he appears to beâ€¦

2.TitleEnglish: In the Forest of the Cherry Blossoms, Beneath the Full Bloom (Part 1)
2.SummaryEnglish: Dazai goes on his first mission working for the mysterious Alchemist, a being of immense power that speaks through a talking cat.

3.TitleEnglish: In the Forest of the Cherry Blossoms, Beneath the Full Bloom (Part 2)
3.SummaryEnglish: Trapped in his own book, Ango Sakaguchi is forced to face the madness he's created.

4.SummaryEnglish: In the modern world, with cell phones, movies, and games, not many people read books. But what would the world look like if books vanished altogether?

5.SummaryEnglish: Trapped in the world of an insane poet, the authors must work to unravel the mystery of their own deaths.

6.SummaryEnglish: With no food except tuna and nothing to do, the stressed out authors are getting into fights. Time to go farm for their own food!

7.SummaryEnglish: Trapped within his own book, Ryunosuke Akutagawa longs to destroy everything he's ever made.

8.SummaryEnglish: Akutagawa is feeling down, but Dazai has the perfect plan to cheer him up: a fan club! But how will he react when Akutagawa reads his book?

9.SummaryEnglish: Akutagawa goes to incredible lengths to save Dazai from being tainted.

10.SummaryEnglish: Suspicions mount as to the true nature of Akutagawa. Who is he, and what is he really here for?

11.SummaryEnglish: The group decides that the only way to save Akutagawa's books is to kill the fake Akutagawa. But is he really a fake?

12.SummaryEnglish: The Taints reveal their ultimate plan to destroy the Library. Can Dazai stop them in time?

13.SummaryEnglish: Akutagawa is ready to exact his revenge on literature. The only surviving author is Dazai. Can he save the books he loves?
